      • Font

        public Font()
        Returns Font initialized with default values

      • Font

        public Font​(@Nullable
            @Nullable Typeface typeface)
        Returns Font with Typeface and default size
        Parameters:
        typeface - typeface and style used to draw and measure text. Pass null for default

      • Font

        public Font​(@Nullable
            @Nullable Typeface typeface,
            float size)
        Parameters:
        typeface - typeface and style used to draw and measure text. Pass null for default
        size - typographic size of the text

      • Font

        public Font​(@Nullable
            @Nullable Typeface typeface,
            float size,
            float scaleX,
            float skewX)
        Constructs Font with default values with Typeface and size in points, horizontal scale, and horizontal skew. Horizontal scale emulates condensed and expanded fonts. Horizontal skew emulates oblique fonts.
        Parameters:
        typeface - typeface and style used to draw and measure text. Pass null for default
        size - typographic size of the text
        scaleX - text horizonral scale
        skewX - additional shear on x-axis relative to y-axis

    • Method Detail

      • _nativeEquals

        @Internal
public boolean _nativeEquals​(Native other)
        Compares fonts, and returns true if they are equivalent. May return false if Typeface has identical contents but different pointers.
        Overrides:
        _nativeEquals in class Native

public void _resetMetrics()

      • isAutoHintingForced

        public boolean isAutoHintingForced()
        If true, instructs the font manager to always hint glyphs. Returned value is only meaningful if platform uses FreeType as the font manager.
        Returns:
        true if all glyphs are hinted

      • areBitmapsEmbedded

        public boolean areBitmapsEmbedded()
        Returns:
        true if font engine may return glyphs from font bitmaps instead of from outlines

      • isSubpixel

        public boolean isSubpixel()
        Returns:
        true if glyphs may be drawn at sub-pixel offsets

      • areMetricsLinear

        public boolean areMetricsLinear()
        Returns:
        true if font and glyph metrics are requested to be linearly scalable

      • isEmboldened

        public boolean isEmboldened()
        Returns true if bold is approximated by increasing the stroke width when creating glyph bitmaps from outlines.
        Returns:
        true if bold is approximated through stroke width

      • isBaselineSnapped

        public boolean isBaselineSnapped()
        Returns true if baselines will be snapped to pixel positions when the current transformation matrix is axis aligned.
        Returns:
        true if baselines may be snapped to pixels

      • setAutoHintingForced

        public Font setAutoHintingForced​(boolean value)
        Sets whether to always hint glyphs. If forceAutoHinting is set, instructs the font manager to always hint glyphs. Only affects platforms that use FreeType as the font manager.
        Parameters:
        value - setting to always hint glyphs
        Returns:
        this

      • setBitmapsEmbedded

        public Font setBitmapsEmbedded​(boolean value)
        Requests, but does not require, to use bitmaps in fonts instead of outlines.
        Parameters:
        value - setting to use bitmaps in fonts
        Returns:
        this

      • setSubpixel

        public Font setSubpixel​(boolean value)
        Requests, but does not require, that glyphs respect sub-pixel positioning.
        Parameters:
        value - setting for sub-pixel positioning
        Returns:
        this

      • setMetricsLinear

        public Font setMetricsLinear​(boolean value)
        Requests, but does not require, linearly scalable font and glyph metrics. For outline fonts 'true' means font and glyph metrics should ignore hinting and rounding. Note that some bitmap formats may not be able to scale linearly and will ignore this flag.
        Parameters:
        value - setting for linearly scalable font and glyph metrics.
        Returns:
        this

      • setEmboldened

        public Font setEmboldened​(boolean value)
        Increases stroke width when creating glyph bitmaps to approximate a bold typeface.
        Parameters:
        value - setting for bold approximation
        Returns:
        this

      • setBaselineSnapped

        public Font setBaselineSnapped​(boolean value)
        Requests that baselines be snapped to pixels when the current transformation matrix is axis aligned.
        Parameters:
        value - setting for baseline snapping to pixels
        Returns:
        this

      • getPath

        @Nullable
public @Nullable Path getPath​(short glyph)
        If the glyph has an outline, returns it. The glyph outline may be empty. Degenerate contours in the glyph outline will be skipped. If glyph is described by a bitmap, returns null.

      • getPaths

        public Path[] getPaths​(short[] glyphs)
        Return glyph outlines, some of which might be null.

      • getMetrics

        @NotNull
public @NotNull FontMetrics getMetrics()
        Returns FontMetrics associated with Typeface. Results are scaled by text size but does not take into account dimensions required by text scale, text skew, fake bold, style stroke, and PathEffect.

      • getSpacing

        public float getSpacing()
        Returns the recommended spacing between lines: the sum of metrics descent, ascent, and leading. Result is scaled by text size but does not take into account dimensions required by stroking and SkPathEffect.
